quizDetails.title: Angular
quizDetails.description: Angular is a platform and framework for building single-page client applications using HTML and TypeScript. Angular is written in TypeScript. It implements core and optional functionality as a set of TypeScript libraries that you import into your applications.

quizDetails.description: HTML (the Hypertext Markup Language) and CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) are two of the core technologies for building Web pages.

quizDetails.title: JavaScript
quizDetails.description: JavaScript is a light-weight object-oriented programming language that is used by several websites for scripting the webpages. It is an interpreted, full-fledged programming language. JavaScript enables dynamic interactivity on websites when it is applied to an HTML document.

quizDetails.title: React JS
quizDetails.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components. It is maintained by Meta.
